exceptions.tactic: intros n f f' g Hf Hf' Hg.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hg was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hf was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hf' was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hg was not found in the current environment.

original: unfold isPR. intros n f f' g Hf Hf' Hg. intros x. specialize (Hg (f x) (f' x)). specialize (Hf x). specialize (Hf' x). apply (Hg (pair (f x) (f' x)) (pair Hf Hf')).
